name: City
description: A bustling urban environment with towering buildings and busy streets.

name: Village
description: A quaint settlement with small houses and friendly villagers.

name: Ash Pit
description: A desolate area covered in ash and debris.

name: Forge Temple
description: An ancient temple filled with the heat and smoke of a working forge.

name: Hunt Temple
description: A sacred place use to have hunters gather and train.

name: Water Temple
description: A serene temple surrounded by flowing water and aquatic life.

name: Jelly
description: A whimsical landscape filled with gelatinous structures and creatures.

name: Backyard
description: A familiar suburban backyard with grass, a fence, and garden features.

name: Abyss
description: A dark and mysterious chasm that seems bottomless.

name: Plain
description: A vast, open expanse of flat land with few trees or landmarks.

name: Forest
description: A dense area filled with tall trees, wildlife, and underbrush.

name: Swamp
description: A wetland area with murky waters, tall grasses, and hidden dangers.

name: Hill
description: Rolling elevations offering wide views of the surrounding area.

name: Cave
description: A dark, underground network of tunnels and chambers

name: Mine
description: A resource-rich area with tunnels and mining equipment.

name: Lake
description: A large body of freshwater surrounded by land.

name: Beach
description: A sandy shoreline next to a large body of water, perfect for relaxation.

name: Ocean
description: A vast and deep body of saltwater teeming with marine life.

name: Deep sea
description: The darkest depths of the ocean, home to strange and mysterious creatures.

name: Heat Vent
description: An area with natural hot springs and steam vents.

name: Island
description: A piece of land surrounded by water, often isolated and tranquil.

name: Vortex
description: A swirling, powerful whirlpool or energy field.

name: Corpse
description: A grim area littered with remains and signs of past battles.

name: Ruin
description: The remnants of an ancient civilization, now overgrown and decayed.

name: Temple
description: A sacred or historical building dedicated to worship or ritual in the past.

name: Mountain
description: A high, rocky terrain offering breathtaking views and challenging climbs.

name: Desert
description: A dry, arid landscape with sand dunes and sparse vegetation.

name: Oasis
description: A lush, green area in the middle of a desert, providing water and shade.

name: Lava
description: A molten, fiery landscape with rivers of flowing lava and volcanic activity.
